channel.title: half on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in half on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Epilogue
item.description: From January 2009 Where are you? I’m here, waiting. Full moon waned to half Dew, you, like stars Independent of the sun Shining because you

item.title: Prologue
item.description: Where are you? I’m here, waiting. Full moon waned to half. You watch me wait, Cruelly test my endurance. The sun rises and sets. I could watch it all alone And know you’re there Watching with me in spirit From the hilltop.
